author: cmpilato
msg: Implement the relevant copy search which is performed to determine
extra revisions to return from svn_fs_revisions_changed(), and plug
that in between node revision successors.  I still don't yet perform this
same search between the youngest node revision and its presumed
next-of-kin when accessed as the not-yet-editor child of copied tree.
(svn_fs__copy_t): Update a comment to be, well, correct.
function to fill in the missing copy revisions.

author: rooneg
msg: Fix the new export editor's handling of files with svn:keywords set.  Note
that the export editor is still turned off, since I'm not sure if Ben has any
other fixes he wanted to finish up before enabling it.
(apply_textdelta): use fb->tmp_file for our unique file, instead of a local
(close_file): before doing anything that might require access to the
contents of our temporary file, close it so that they will be flushed out
to disk.  also, in an unrelated cleanup, allocate final_kw on the stack
